Participants.evidence: undergoing elective total arch replacement using 5- to 8-cm upper mini-sternotomy between 2018 and 2022

Intervention.evidence: mini-access total arch replacement performed by stratified approaches and to evaluate perioperative outcomes

Objective.evidence: We aimed to present a mini-access total arch replacement performed by stratified approaches and to evaluate perioperative outcomes

Result_Outcome.evidence: lower risks of stroke (odds ratio, 0.88; 95% CI, 0.78-1.00; P = .049) and a composite of major complications (odds ratio, 0.79; 95% CI, 0.68-0.92; P = .003)
